name: https://www.googleapis.com/auth/youtube
description: Read and write access to your YouTube account

name: https://www.googleapis.com/auth/youtube.readonly
description: Read-only access to your YouTube account

name: https://www.googleapis.com/auth/youtube.upload
description: Upload videos to your YouTube account

name: https://www.googleapis.com/auth/youtube.force-ssl
description: Force SSL access to your YouTube account
